hey Asandir!! I was in group with you last night in Oasis of Marr with my
wood elf ranger, Kilesha, remember me? my bard's name is Lycria. Hope to see
you there again. Oh and i was most perplexed when one of our group blamed
"that stupid speed song" for him falling from the Pillar and damaging
himself.

seeya there!
